events.name: Anaheim Ducks at Tampa Bay Lightning

headlines.description: — Jake Guentzel and Anthony Cirelli each scored twice and the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Anaheim Ducks 4-3 on Saturday to snap a four-game skid.
headlines.shortLinkText: Guentzel, Cirelli each score 2 as Lightning beat Ducks 4-3 to snap four-game skid

events.name: Vegas Golden Knights at Florida Panthers

headlines.description: — Sergei Bobrovsky stopped 17 shots for his 50th career shutout, Cole Schwindt scored against his former team and the Florida Panthers became the first team to beat the Vegas Golden Knights in regulation this season, winning 3-0 on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bobrovsky's 50th career shutout leads Panthers to 3-0 win over Golden Knights

headlines.description: — Logan Cooley scored twice in the first 3:29, Nick Schmaltz also had two goals and the Utah Mammoth won their sixth straight game, beating the Minnesota Wild 6-2 on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cooley, Schmaltz each score twice as Mammoth stay hot with 6-2 win over Wild

events.name: Columbus Blue Jackets at Pittsburgh Penguins

headlines.description: — Kent Johnson, Adam Fantilli and Kirill Marchenko scored in the shootout to lift the Columbus Blue Jackets past the Pittsburgh Penguins, 5-4 on Saturday night.

headlines.description: — Dylan Cozens and Drake Batherson scored twice each for the Ottawa Senators, who spoiled Alex Ovechkin's 1,500th game by routing the Washington Capitals 7-1 on Saturday night.
